info.name: Quicksol Real Estate API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Quicksol Real Estate Management System

**Version:** 1.1.0
**Last Updated:** 2026-01-17

**Authentication Requirements:**
- All endpoints (except OAuth token) require **Bearer Token** from OAuth 2.0
- Business endpoints require **Session ID** from user login
- Fingerprint validation active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)
- Session expires after 2 hours of inactivity

**CRITICAL - Session ID Transmission:**
- **GET requests** (type='http'): session_id via header `X-Openerp-Session-Id`
- **POST/PUT/PATCH** (type='json'): session_id in JSON body (direct property, NOT in params wrapper)
- **Never send session_id in body for GET requests** - it will be ignored!

**IMPORTANT - JSON Format:**
- **OAuth endpoints**: Direct JSON (no JSONRPC wrapper)
- **Business endpoints**: Direct JSON (no JSONRPC wrapper)
- **DO NOT use** {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "call", "params": {...}}

**User-Agent Consistency:**
Keep User-Agent consistent during session lifetime to avoid fingerprint validation failures.

**Standards Compliance:** This collection follows ADR-016 standards.

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: OAuth 2.0 token management endpoints (Bearer only - no session required)

exec: console.log('✅ Access token saved to environment');
console.error('❌ Failed to extract access_token from response');

request.description:
**Authentication:** None required

Obtain OAuth 2.0 Bearer token for API access.

**Grant Type:** client_credentials

**Response:** Returns access_token, expires_in, and token_type

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

**Authentication:** None required

Refresh an expired access token using refresh_token.

**Grant Type:** refresh_token

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

**Authentication:** Bearer Token required

Revoke an active OAuth token.

**Response:** 200 OK on success

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

item.name: 2. User Management
item.description: User login/logout and session management (Dual Auth: Bearer + Session)

exec: console.log('✅ Session ID saved to environment');
console.error('❌ Failed to extract session_id from response');

request.description:
**Authentication:** Bearer Token required
**Multi-tenancy:** Company context retrieved from user
**Fingerprint validation:** Active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)

**User-Agent consistency:** Required for session validation
**Session expiry:** 2 hours inactivity

Authenticate user and create session.

**Response:** Returns session_id, user info, and company context

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

**Authentication:** Bearer Token + Session ID required
**Multi-tenancy:** Company isolation active (@require_company)
**Fingerprint validation:** Active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)

**IMPORTANT:** For POST requests (type='json'), session_id MUST be sent in JSON body (direct property, NOT in params).

**User-Agent consistency:** Required for session validation
**Session expiry:** 2 hours inactivity

Invalidate user session.

**Note:** Direct JSON format (no JSONRPC wrapper)

header.description: Session ID for fingerprint validation (REQUIRED for GET)

request.description:
**Authentication:** Bearer Token + Session ID required
**Multi-tenancy:** Company isolation active (@require_company)
**Fingerprint validation:** Active (IP + User-Agent + Accept-Language)

**IMPORTANT:** For GET requests (type='http'), session_id MUST be sent via header 'X-Openerp-Session-Id', NOT in request body.

**User-Agent consistency:** Required for session validation
**Session expiry:** 2 hours inactivity

Get authenticated user information and company context.
